kaptl
===========

CLI for KAPTL generator. For more info, check https://www.kaptl.com

installation
------------

    pip install kaptl

Supported platforms
-------------------

Currently tested on Windows and Linux with Python 2.7. Should be usable on all modern platforms.

Release notes
-------------

0.1.0
~~~~~

Initial release

Info
====

-  Homepage: https://www.kaptl.com
